sentences.english: Revenue from the 381 stores is not counted in GOME's annual revenue.

sentences.english: Joined in Chinese Exlibris Research Institute, China Artists Society (2008). Executive member of Chinese Exlibris Research Institute, China Artists Society.

sentences.english: Bai Bohua is now the Chinese Artists Association, member of Beijing branch.
